Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I bought this cell phone because I like it so much.  If you want a basic cell phone that is inexpensive and of good quality without all the gadgets you don't need anyway, this would be a good choice.

Reviews.Title: A Phone that a Phone
Reviews.Author: Tim OCallaghan
Reviews.Content: If you want a phone for communication ONLY then this is a perfect choice. I am on my second one and find them durable, reliable, easy to transport, easy to use, and have a style that isnt going away.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: I was expecting the phone to get in between Monday and Tuesday next week. Much to my surprise it arrived yesterday. Mint condition, still in original packaging, and not a scratch on the phone plus original protective stickers on it. Thank you to the seller for the quick delivery and awesome phone!
